\Okta\Resource

\Okta\ResourceApp

Implementation of the Okta Apps resource, access via $okta->app

http://developer.okta.com/docs/api/resources/apps.html

add()

add(string  $name, string  $label, string  $signOnMode, array  $settings = null, boolean  $activate = null) : object

Adds a new application to your Okta organization.

Parameters

string $name

Application name
string $label

Application label
string $signOnMode

Application sign on mode
array $settings

Associative array of application settings
boolean $activate

If true, executes activation lifecycle operation when creating the application

Returns

object —

Application object

Tags

None found

listApps()

listApps(array  $query = null) : array

Enumerates apps added to your organization with pagination. A subset of apps can be returned that match a supported filter expression or query.

Parameters

array $query

Array of query parameters/values

Returns

array —

delete()

delete(string  $aid) : object

Removes an inactive application. Applications must be deactivated before they can be deleted.

Parameters

string $aid

ID of application to delete

object —

Unique key of Application
integer $limit

Specifies the number of results for a page

Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of assignments

Tags

removeUser()

removeUser(string  $aid, string  $uid) : object

Removes an assignment for a user from an application.

This is a destructive operation and the user's app profile will not be recoverable. If the app is enabled for provisioning and configured to deactivate users, the user will also be deactivated in the target application.

Parameters

string $aid

Unique key of Application
string $uid

Unique key of assigned User

Returns

object —

An empty object

Tags

None found
